mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.bookName ,a.createTime,d.username ,b.bookClassValue,b.bookClassKey,b.id bookClassId ,a.updateDetailTime FROM book a , bookclass b, book_bookclass c, userinfo d WHERE a.id=c.bookId AND b.bookClassKey=c.bookClassKey AND a.createId=d.id and b.bookClassKey=#{bookClassKey} and a.bookName=#{bookName}
SELECT a.bookId, b.levelName, a.price, a.`status`, a.startTime, a.endTime FROM bookprice a ,vip_level b WHERE a.vipLevel=b.id and a.bookId=#{bookId}
